structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Contracts for fire, ambulance, and emergency squad services.
law.text: The emergency services board may contract with private and public entities to provide fire, ambulance, and emergency squad services.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 429, sec. 8, effective July 14, 2000.
